item.title: New Site, New Start
item.description: Good morning, or maybe I should say Goodnight. üåô It’s approximately 7am. Yes, I’ve spent the whole night messing around with the Hugo, Docker, Ansible and a few other pieces of tech as I enjoy my one week break after leaving my previous employer. Honestly, I feel like a little schoolboy again who is too excited to sleep the night before a school trip. I ‚ù§Ô∏è tech. So this week, more so, this sleepless night I’ve successfully migrated domains and in the process have had to enjoy the pain of updating my contact and login e-mail addresses everywhere (surely there must be an app for this!
